title: looking for support or jungler, casual games for flex team (bronze)
body:
we got 4 friends, just need a 5th person to play support or jungle, we're beginners just having fun but we need a 5th to be able to play together.
we usually play around 5pm aedt (melbourne time), we use skype to talk, facebook to message each other etc. 
let me know, would love to have someone that jsut wants to have fun and climb whilst doing so.

we win most games but lose a few due to lack of experience etc etc, were capable players that have the ability to climb.

replies.body: im keen to have a few rounds with you boys hit me up, im on most of the time. I can top, supp, jungle hardstuck gold low elo hashinshin at your service
added you, let me know man definitely be keen to play some games, liek i said we play at 5pm most days, probably be online today (18/2) at around 4-4.30 aedt if you wanna join

Don't play with Blando he'll just cry about how Riot hates Bruisers and rage when he gets camped kappa

(Mods can fuck off this is clearly sarcasm)
this guy has been hardstuck for like 2 seasons, just absolute gutter trash low gold ls/iwd wannabe fuck kappa
At least I'm hardstuck Plat you low-gold hashinshin wannabe
you literally havent been plat for two seasons lel
id be down to play sometimes if im free, im a gold 1 thresh main in solo q, can fill any role but too
welcome to join us man, were all in bronze though so may be a bit under your skill level at this point, but welcome if you want to.
i dont mind, its all abit of fun,i can play some other champs
hey what role do you play? love to have you join, ill add you on league

I am new but enjoy PLaying jungle, Looking too join a group of friends on here also, I live in QLD and have skype. 

My Skype is Redux-Returns

absolutely,  ill add you on league
ill add you on skype too
